name: WKEM 2018 : 2018 International Workshop on Key Engineering Materials
content: ●Publication and Indexing All the registered and presented papers will be included in the conference proceeding which is published in the volume of conference proceeding , which will be indexed byEi Compendex, SCOPUS, Inspec, Conference Proceedings Citation Index – Science (CPCI-S)(Thomson Reuters, Web of Science)and other databases.
